content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Manual Iron Smelting Setup at (5.0, -73.0)
Consists of two furnaces working in parallel:
- Stone furnace at (5.0, -73.0)
- Stone furnace at (7.0, -73.0)
Both furnaces are operational and smelting iron ore into plates

### Automated Iron Mining & Smelting Setup 1 at (-20.0, -55.0)
Complete mining and smelting operation consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-20.0, -55.0) mining iron ore
- Stone furnace at (-19.0, -53.0) positioned at drill's drop position
Both entities are fueled with coal and operational

### Automated Iron Mining & Smelting Setup 2 at (-15.0, -50.0)
Complete mining and smelting operation consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-15.0, -50.0) mining iron ore
- Stone furnace at (-14.0, -48.0) positioned at drill's drop position
Both entities are fueled with coal and operational

### Incomplete Mining Setup at (-7.0, -56.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-7.0, -56.0) (non-operational due to lack of fuel)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting requirements
- When crafting items that require smelted materials (like iron plates), ensure they are smelted in a furnace first as they cannot be directly crafted

### Errors related to item extraction
- Verify that items are actually present in the target entity before attempting extraction
- Check the entity status and inventory before attempting to extract items

### Errors related to inventory management
- Always verify required items are in inventory before attempting to use them
- When placing mining drills, ensure you have coal in inventory for fueling them

### Errors related to entity placement
- When working with building coordinates, use proper attribute access methods instead of dictionary-style access
- Place furnaces exactly at mining drill drop positions to ensure proper material flow
- Ensure proper spacing between entities to avoid blocking and inefficient setups

### Errors related to automation
- Monitor entity status regularly to ensure proper operation
- Place furnaces at exact drop positions of mining drills to prevent material flow issues
- Keep track of fuel levels in burner entities to maintain continuous operation
